images.usage: Showcase the beauty of autumn in Turkey, highlighting warm colors and inviting landscapes.
Highlight Antalya as a prime travel destination during the autumn season.
Facilitate easy booking process for travelers.

icons.usage: Indicate special offers and discounts on flights.
Indicate special offers and discounts on flights.

assetRequirements.purpose: to showcase the beauty of autumn in Turkey, emphasizing warm colors and inviting landscapes
assetRequirements.visual_style: warm autumn colors, scenic views of Antalya and cultural landmarks
assetRequirements.content_context: depicting the soft climate, warm sea, and cultural experiences available in Turkey during autumn

assetRequirements.purpose: to highlight specific attractions in Antalya during the autumn season
assetRequirements.visual_style: vibrant images of food festivals, historical streets, and spa experiences
assetRequirements.content_context: showcasing the cultural and gastronomic experiences available in Antalya during autumn

usageInstructions.placement: Place according to campaign layout requirements
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Ощутите волшебство осени в Турции с Kupibilet!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected hero". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
